short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Radio SLO is extension app where you can select your popular radio to play in background of chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Radio SLO - Slovenian Online Radio Player!

Enjoy your favorite radio stations effortlessly with our simple Chrome extension.

Key Features: • Play radio stations in the background • Easy-to-use interface • 100% free • Works seamlessly across websites

How it works:

Add Radio SLO to your Chrome browser
Click the extension icon
Choose your favorite station
Relax and enjoy your music!

We value your feedback! Help us make Radio SLO even better by commenting below.
